description: Largest multiple factor of n for nonsquarefree n (A013929).
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Greatest Prime Factor
mathematica: Select[ FactorInteger[#]//Reverse, #[[2]]>1&, 1][[1, 1]]& /@ Select[ Range[300], !SquareFreeQ[#]& ] (* _Jean-FranÃ§ois Alcover_, Nov 06 2012 *)
prog: (Haskell)a046028 n = a046028_list !! (n-1)a046028_list = f 1 where   f x | null zs   = f (x + 1)       | otherwise = (fst $ head zs) : f (x + 1)       where zs = reverse $ filter ((> 1) . snd) $                  zip (a027748_row x) (a124010_row x)-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Dec 29 2012
author: _Eric W. Weisstein_
